Dingle Peninsula is experiencing challenging conditions today with a hefty 10 ft @ 11s W swell, but fresh 21 mph WNW winds are making it blown out. Tomorrow, the swell remains strong at 10 ft @ 12s W, but winds pick up to a fresh 36 mph SSE, keeping it messy. Day after, expect even bigger waves at 15 ft @ 13s WSW, with winds hitting 37 mph W, making it a tough day for surfing. Best: today.
